Name: BE ALIVE
French_Gloss: ê. vivant, vivre (ne pas ê. décédé)

Name: EARRING
French_Gloss: bague ou boucle d’oreille -cpd: see [kàmb-ù]-[kòrb-ò] , hà.è-[kòrb-ò] , cè:-[kòrb-ò] .

Name: FOAM
French_Gloss: bulles, écume, mousse (de savon, de thé) [verb kù:fà ].

Name: FORGIVE
French_Gloss: excuser, pardonner (qqch) -ex: .ò né [.jéy .=´ .´yà:fà] they said they (had) forgiven it (e.g. debt)

Name: KNEE
French_Gloss: donner un coup de genou à [cf. kànjè].

Name: LIFT
French_Gloss: amener, venir avec; amorcer (une matière, dans un discours) [irregular combination of kà ‘come’ plus ndù ‘with’; 3SgO kà:-.d-â, Imprt with 3SgO kà:-nd-â without -.suffix] [< kà 2].

Name: LIGHT (WEIGHT)
French_Gloss: ê. faible, facile, à bon marché

Name: PENIS
French_Gloss: membre viril, sexe de l’homme [common in insults; TSK béndè] [SYN:zòfól-ò ] -poss (inal): 1Sg bènd-èy, 3Sg bènd-ò , 3FullSg .ángá bènd-ô -ex of insult: bà:b-à.­bénd-ò your father’s prick!

Name: PERSON
French_Gloss: chose ou personne jolie [DIMIN in form].

Name: POCKET
French_Gloss: poche -poss: 1Sg zìfíy-è , 2Sg zìfíy-ò-nó.] [cf. Za & TSK zí:bà , Ka zíbà , <Ar vj yb , similarly Ful njiiba, Hausaːljifu].

Name: ROOT
French_Gloss: nerf, tendon, vaisseau sanguin, corde d’instrument de musique, air de musique, racine

Name: ROTTEN
French_Gloss: ê. pourri [adj fùmb-ò , Intens dús! , Fact fúmb-éyndí , cf. fùmb-ànd-à ].

Name: ROUGH
French_Gloss: (surface) raide [<verb kású 1a] ­ex: sáhán kàs-ò harsh fabric

Name: SHARP
French_Gloss: (lame) ê. tranchante [homophonous to kâ:n 1; cf. sèmbèlèy ] [adj kà:n-ò 2, Fact ká:n-éyndí 2].

Name: SHOW
French_Gloss: exposer, montrer (qqch) -ex (reflexive): .ò ­nám [.ò. ­bó.] .bánj-éyndí s-â. they’ll show themselves to you

Name: SMOOTH
French_Gloss: aplanir, aplatir (surface d’un mur, ou sol d’une maison, avec une truelle.) [<Ful vmeel-].

Name: THINK
French_Gloss: croire; réfléchir [cf. hò.gù, só:sê, lásá:bû, síkkê] -ex: à.bò .mí:ló [.ò.gú wìy-à/ he thinks they are doing the killing

Name: TOBACCO
French_Gloss: tabac [related verb súndú 1a; SYN:táb-ò ; cf. hámpérê ]

Name: TONGS
French_Gloss: pinces (pour enlever les échardes); pinces (du forgeron)
